news.title: One year on from the UK's grand AI plan: Has its infrastructure buildout been a success?
news.summary: Big challenges remain for the U.K. to fulfil its ambitions. Hefty financial commitments from tech giants are positive signals, but big challenges remain.

news.title: Airlines cancel more than 1,500 flights ahead of winter storm. Here's what to know
news.summary: Airlines waived change fees ahead of a large winter storm and low temperatures after the busy Christmas holiday. Airlines waived change fee ahead of winter storm, low temperatures.

news.title: Nvidia-Groq deal is structured to keep 'fiction of competition alive,' analyst says
news.summary: Groq's description of its Nvidia deal as a "non-exclusive licensing agreement" mimics other recent big AI transactions orchestrated by U.S. tech giants.

news.title: Nvidia buying AI chip startup Groq's assets for about $20 billion in its largest deal on record
news.summary: N Nvidia is making its largest purchase ever, acquiring assets from 9-year-old chip startup Groq. The deal is worth about $20 billion.

news.title: Oracle shares on pace for worst quarter since 2001 as new CEOs face concerns about AI build-out
news.summary: Investors want to know if Oracle, under new CEOs Clay Magouyrk and Mike Sicilia, can pay for and deliver data centers packed with Nvidia chips.

news.title: What are the hottest tech stocks for 2026? Here’s what ChatGPT and Gemini had to say.
news.summary: MarketWatch asked the leading LLMs for their top stock picks — but the answers suggest AI may be following the herd instead of truly reasoning.

news.title: ‘You need a third job or a rich husband’: I fell victim to Allen Stanford’s multibillion-dollar Ponzi scheme and survived
news.summary: “It’s wrong to talk down to anyone,” he said. “If you have never found yourself in a situation where your life does a complete 180, it's wrong.”

news.title: ‘So much for holiday cheer’: I saw a guest take a bottle of wine as they left a Christmas party. Do I tell the host?
news.summary: “I guess he thought no one would notice. It came in a gift bag, and it looked expensive,” she said.

news.title: I want to gift my grandnieces, ages 5 and 10, stocks. How do I make sure they get an equal amount when they turn 18?
news.summary: “One child’s portfolio will have an additional five years of growth,” he says. “One. child” will have a portfolio that will grow for five more years, he adds.

news.title: I make more than my wife. Can she claim Social Security at 62 and later switch to spousal benefits?
news.summary: “I delayed collecting my benefits until this year, when I turned 70,” he said. “I didn’t want to miss out on anything.”
